components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: User Sign-up and New Account Creation is Impacted in IE1 Region

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing issues with user sign-up and new account creation that is impacting the IE1 region. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Safaricom Network in Kenya

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Safaricom network in Kenya. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delay to Claro Network Uruguay

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery Receipt delays when sending messages to Claro Network Uruguay. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in the next 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery Receipt delays when sending messages to Claro Network Uruguay. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in the next 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery Receipt delays when sending messages to Claro Network Uruguay. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 August 2024 at 13:20 PDT until 06 August 2024 at 20:05 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Product: Verify Silent Network Auth

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 August 2024 at 18:00 PDT until 07 August 2024 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from AT&T United States handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter Scheduled Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
The  maintenance activity is now being pushed out to the 6th Aug at 21:00 PST
Maintenance Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically removing a non-essential component from our system. This update is expected to be completed in less than a second and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system's performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately. Should a rollback be necessary, there may be a  downtime of approximately 2 minutes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 28 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 05 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
07 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 07 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
12 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 12 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
14 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 14 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
19 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 19 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
21 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 21 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
26 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 26 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT
28 August 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 28 August 2024 at 17:00 PDT

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
